ygData.subject: Re: Starting a new char
ygData.msgSnippet: I m thinking of a Wood Elf Druid. ... -- Gary Qui Hong Loong Technical Support Executive Pacific Internet Technical Support Department . Pacific Internet
ygData.messageBody:
I'm thinking of a Wood Elf Druid.

Entreri wrote:

> From: "Entreri" <drizzt@...>
>
> Ive created a new chr .Hes a bard,level2 :)..but In faydark,so u might wanna
> hunt with me :)
>
> Entreri
>
> Email: drizzt@...
> ICQ UIN: 2326860
> Previewer, Singularity Gaming Network
> http://www.sg-gaming.net
> Your Single Source of Everything Gaming
>
> .plan at
> http://www.wplan.com/cgibin/directplan.cgi?name=Entreri&viewpass=
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> To: 'sg-everquest@onelist.com' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> Date: Thursday, August 05, 1999 5:13 PM
> Subject: [sg-everquest] Starting a new char
>
> >From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >
> >At lvl 26 with 2 bubb more to lvl 27, I really hate to restart, thou' I
> >personally would LOVE to have a new dream char tat start with lvl 20
> >*grin*. Imagine, it takes time to go thru the 'miserable' stage of a
> >newbie wiz, where no one wanna hunt with u and everyone steal from u - you
> >are the worst life form in EQ, just like a PCB recruit in army, you are
> >worse than chicken backside blah blah blah! Argh!
> >Furthermore I haven't find any good stuff for my Zil yet, where got time to
> >find good item to start my new wiz off? ;(
> >
> >On the other hand, I'm also very uncertain as too which race to choose for
> >my new wiz. Personally I hate to been KOS as a DE, hate to be so short
> >(ugly) and short-sighted as a gnome, hate to have night blindness as a
> >erudite (ok halo of light may help but my erudite wiz friend still half
> >blind at night, esp in place with fog), hate to be so weak (low STR of 55)
> >as a HE and hate to be a half-f**k wiz as a human (average stats plus night
> >blindness).
> >
> >Amg all, I love the DEX/AGI stats of gnome, the look and height of HE, the
> >INT of Erudite, and the no xp penalty of human. U tell me which to choose
> >lor, hehe.
> >
> >If I were to start a new wiz in Innoruuk, anyone wanna hunt with me? ;)
> >
> >Ziltus
> >
> >On Thursday, 05 August, 1999 2:14 PM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy
> >[SMTP:sccheng@...] wrote:
> >> From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
> >>
> >> well... the thing about JBOOTs is that it gives something like SOW but
> >> slightly less 2/3 of it i heard... and it got unlimied charges... so its
> >> permanent effect... and bcos necros use DOT and only DOT for killing...
> >with
> >> the help of JBOOTs... we can kite things easily... if u wonder how many
> >> necros managed to do kiting to kill a SG... thats how... hehee.. thast y
> >its
> >> the most impt thing on my list... BUT the bad thing bout it is that its
> >NO
> >> DROP and NO TRADE... so i have to be there to loot the thing...
> >>
> >> yes INT items are useful to me as well... but they will be of lower
> >priority
> >> as compared to JBOOTs... although the outlook of the character is
> >important
> >> (FBR n stuff)... hehee...
> >> as far as other attributes are concern... i think they do play a part...
> >at
> >> this point i might wanna ask u if u wanna restart... hehee... i know its
> >a
> >> pain... but its good to have ya dream char... n its still not too late
> >for u
> >> to restart... i know that WIZ use STA and INT as their main... having
> >heard
> >> that high STA actually helps u to regain mana faster... dunno how true...
> >n
> >> if they r the main things... they will play a part in ya char... i
> >suppose
> >> its the spells that relies on them or something... so i gave 100 DEX and
> >120
> >> INT to my necro... and so far im still quite happy with it...
> >>
> >> just what i thought...
> >> Nicademous
> >> ----- Original Message -----
> >> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >> To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> >> Sent: Thursday, August 05, 1999 2:50 PM
> >> Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Guk Raid on National Day
> >>
> >>
> >> > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >> >
> >> > Why JBoot is so impt? I thot it got something close to SoW but with
> >> > charges right? If I'm not wrong, EQ is now trying to reduce higher-lvl
> >> > player loot stuffs for lower lvl players. Eg for Observer staff, when
> >u
> >> > 1st loot it, it got 1-49 charges of sentienl(?) effect but once u pass
> >it
> >> > to someone (give or sell), it will automatically reduce to one charge.
> > So
> >> > if that Fboot got charges (and if this reducing charge thingy affect
> >it),
> >> > it's not very useful liao, correct?
> >> >
> >> > To me, the most impt is those artifact tat give me INT (remember I said
> >I
> >> > only pump my INT by 5 point when I create char? sigh), DEX and AGI.
> > The
> >> > rest not so impt to me, AC also kinda useless. Best is to have a2HB
> >weap
> >> > with some unlimited dam spell effect (not charges, small dam also
> >shiok).
> >> > Knn like tat Stormblade, got unlimited lvl 49 spell effect, who stil
> >> wanna
> >> > be casters? ;(
> >> >
> >> > Ziltus
> >> >
> >> > On Thursday, 05 August, 1999 12:12 PM, Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy
> >> > [SMTP:sccheng@...] wrote:
> >> > > From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
> >> > >
> >> > > i think its fair that some guys will get some stuff..... just say b4
> >> hand
> >> > > wat stuff u expecting n what not... its not nice to see us fighting
> >> among
> >> > > ourselves just bcos of stuff.... personally... everything got INT n
> >DEX
> >> > will
> >> > > be good for me... but i dont really mind not having them... the most
> >> > > important thing for me... is... JBOOTs... (BUT that is not in GUK)...
> >> > >
> >> > > Nicademous
> >> > > A Dark Elf Necromancer that is waiting for the day to get his own
> >> > JBoots...
> >> > > ----- Original Message -----
> >> > > From: Sereph <garford@...>
> >> > > To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> >> > > Sent: Thursday, August 05, 1999 12:27 PM
> >> > > Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Guk Raid on National Day
> >> > >
> >> > >
> >> > > > From: Sereph <garford@...>
> >> > > >
> >> > > > Anything you DON'T want?
> >> > > >
> >> > > > LKW wrote:
> >> > > >
> >> > > > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >> > > > >
> >> > > > > I'm still wearing the stuffs I used to have at lvl 16, with the
> >> > > exception
> >> > > > > of BI Medallion which I got from a 'rich man' last night, hehe.
> >> > > > >
> >> > > > > Basically all those which can be used by wiz I also want. Those
> >> > cannot
> >> > > be
> >> > > > > used by me, but got extra, which I can sell, I also dun mind
> >taking
> >> > up,
> >> > > > > hehe. I need to max out my smithing skill ASAP, now at skill 105
> >I
> >> > > think,
> >> > > > > which only allow me to make banded gorget and bracer with 80%
> >> > sucessful
> >> > > > > rate. Kinda discouraged to fail making boots as a master smith,
> >> sigh.
> >> > > > >
> >> > > > > Anyway, here's wat I want ;)
> >> > > > >
> >> > > > > Woven parts- W2
> >> > > > > Crown of the Froglock Kings(Can attempt to try) - W2
> >> > > > > Shimmering Orb - W2
> >> > > > > Bracelet of Woven Grass - W2
> >> > > > > Serpentine Bracer (another maybe) - W2
> >> > > > > Elf Hide Gloves - S2/W2
> >> > > > > Flowing Black Silk Sash (another maybe) - S2/W2
> >> > > > > Embroidered Black Cape (another maybe) - W2
> >> > > > > Adamantite stuff - W2
> >> > > > > Collar of Undead Protection - W2
> >> > > > > Gatorscale stuff - W2 (dunno if I can use, but heck care, grab
> >1st,
> >> > > hehe)
> >> > > > > Sack that reduce 80% weight - W2
> >> > > > > Guise of the Deceiver (Maybe........) - W2
> >> > > > > Azure Sleeves (maybe) - W2
> >> > > > > Mesh stuff - W2
> >> > > > > Runed Bone Fork - S2/W2
> >> > > > >
